_source.text: 12. "John 16:7-13 But I tell you the truth, It is better for you that I should go away; for if I do not away, the Comforter will not come to you; but if I should go, I will send him to you.

text: 12. "John 16:7-13 But **I** tell you **the** **truth**, It **is** **better** for you that **I** should go **away**; for if **I** do
not **away**, the Comforter will not come to you; but if **I** should go, **I** will send him to you.

_source.text: 50 35 But I say the truth unto you; It is better 619 for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Paraclete will not come unto you; but if I go away, I will send him unto you.
